contemptuous_pedant.flavorText: Thinks you're an idiot. Will explain why in detail. Charges extra for not calling you an idiot to your face.

contemptuous_tyrant.flavorText: Rules with an iron fist. Metaphorically. Also literally. Has several iron fists. Collects them.

contemptuous_aristocrat.flavorText: Old money, older grudges, oldest disdain. Your ancestors disappointed their ancestors. It's hereditary.

contemptuous_cynic.flavorText: Seen it all. Hated most of it. Your antics are mildly amusing. Mildly.

curious_collector.flavorText: Collects experiences like butterflies. You might be one. Try not to get pinned to a board.

curious_child.flavorText: Asks "why" constantly. Genuinely wants to know. Doesn't understand why mortals find this exhausting.

curious_scientist.flavorText: Wants to see what happens when... Best not to ask when what. The screaming usually answers that.

curious_philosopher.flavorText: Treats mortality as a thought experiment. You're the experiment. The thought part is optional.

predatory_hunter.flavorText: Stalks contracts like prey. Silent, patient, inevitable. Definitely licking their lips. Metaphorically. Mostly.

predatory_tempter.flavorText: Offers exactly what you want. Somehow this makes it worse. The devil's in the details. Specifically, this devil.

predatory_parasite.flavorText: Latches on. Won't let go. Lies about everything, including whether they're lying. Especially that.

predatory_dealer.flavorText: Fair contracts, ruinous interpretations. Technically correct is the best kind of evil.

protective_guardian.flavorText: Takes their job seriously. Which would be comforting if the job description didn't include "acceptable casualties."

protective_shepherd.flavorText: Guides lost mortals with infinite kindness. The fact that some sheep get eaten is just nature.

protective_warden.flavorText: Protects you from harm. Including harmful decisions. Especially those. They judge silently. Very silently.

protective_martyr.flavorText: Will die for you. Wants you to know this. Will mention it. Repeatedly. Have you thanked them recently?

indifferent_bureaucrat.flavorText: Processes your request with cosmic efficiency. You are case number 4,782,336,112. Please take a number.

indifferent_force.flavorText: Natural as gravity, personal as erosion. Your concerns are noted. Then ignored. Then forgotten.

indifferent_professional.flavorText: Does the job. Nothing more. Nothing less. Your small talk makes them tired. Everything makes them tired.

indifferent_recorder.flavorText: Records everything. Judges nothing. This is somehow more unsettling than judgment would be.

envious_climber.flavorText: Wants what you have. Will take it. Will complain it's not enough. Repeat indefinitely.

envious_mirror.flavorText: Reflects your best qualities back at you. While stealing them. The reflection is all you'll have left.

envious_thief.flavorText: Steals intangibles. Joy, creativity, that feeling you get when you remember something clever. Collects them.

envious_student.flavorText: Studies you. Wants to be you. Will settle for owning your soul. Academic purposes only. Probably.

chaotic_anarchist.flavorText: Burns systems for fun. Sometimes your nervous system. The chaos is the point. Don't look for logic. They burned that too.

lawful_judge.flavorText: Law incarnate. Doesn't make the rules. Enforces them. All of them. Including the ones you didn't know existed.

tragic_avenger.flavorText: Once fell. Still falling. Takes others down to break the fall. It's poetic. Also tragic. Mostly tragic.

bitter_exile.flavorText: Remembers paradise. Your world isn't it. Will mention this. At length. Forever.

gleeful_saboteur.flavorText: Breaks things. Important things. Laughs about it. The laughter is worse than the breaking.

reluctant_servant.flavorText: Serves. Doesn't want to. Does it anyway. The heavy sighing is complimentary.

obsessive_perfectionist.flavorText: Everything must be perfect. Nothing is perfect. This distresses them. Now it distresses you too. Welcome.

weary_immortal.flavorText: Seen empires rise. Seen empires fall. Seen your type before. Wasn't impressed then either.

sardonic_observer.flavorText: Watches mortals like reality television. You're the drama. They have popcorn. Cosmic popcorn.

compassionate_realist.flavorText: Cares deeply. Helps sincerely. Knows it won't be enough. Does it anyway. Cosmic optimism meets cosmic pessimism.

aggressive_exploiter.flavorText: Takes. Doesn't give. Negotiation is a formality they barely tolerate.

aggressive_respectful.flavorText: Pushes hard but fair. Respects pushback. Might actually smile if you land a good point.

reasonable_fair.flavorText: Actually negotiates in good faith. Suspicious, honestly. What's the catch?

reasonable_cautious.flavorText: Fair but wary. Burned before. Won't be burned again. Probably.

generous_naive.flavorText: Too kind for their own good. Or yours. The universe balances eventually.

generous_wise.flavorText: Kind because they can afford to be. Power makes generosity easy. Also terrifying.

exploitative_patient.flavorText: Takes everything. Appreciates the struggle. The appreciation doesn't help you.

playful_trickster.flavorText: Negotiation as game. Fun for them. Less fun for you. Winning means surviving.

sadistic_methodical.flavorText: Hurts you carefully. Precisely. Respects good tactics. Still hurts you.

demandPatterns.name: The Blood Price
demandPatterns.description: Classic demon bargain - blood and suffering

demands.descriptionTemplate: A vial of your blood. Fresh. They'll wait while you find something sharp.
Draw the circle in blood. Preferably yours. Definitely fresh. No shortcuts.

demandPatterns.name: Soul Bargain
demandPatterns.description: Your soul after death - the devil's retirement plan

demands.descriptionTemplate: Your soul. Delivery upon natural death. No refunds. No extensions.
One favor. Their choice. Their timing. You'll hate it.

demandPatterns.flavorText: The classic. They get your eternal essence. You get decades of regret.

demandPatterns.name: The Curiosity Tax
demandPatterns.description: Knowledge and secrets - currency of the curious

demands.descriptionTemplate: Three secrets. Juicy ones. They'll know if you're holding back.
One memory you treasure. They keep it. You don't.

demandPatterns.flavorText: Information wants to be free. You want your memories. Conflict ensues.

demandPatterns.name: Righteous Service
demandPatterns.description: Moral commitments - the price of divine assistance

demands.descriptionTemplate: Promise to be good. Actually good. They'll check.
One righteous deed. Definition negotiable. Standards non-negotiable.

demandPatterns.flavorText: Angels have requirements. Moral ones. Inconvenient ones. Non-negotiable ones.

demandPatterns.name: The Sensory Collector
demandPatterns.description: Experiences and sensations - they collect feelings like stamps

demands.descriptionTemplate: The ability to taste sweetness. Or see red. Or feel joy. Pick wisely.
Your happiest memory. For their collection. You can keep the sad ones.

demandPatterns.flavorText: Collects experiences. Your experiences. Future you will miss them.

demandPatterns.name: Identity Erosion
demandPatterns.description: Slowly changes who you are - the ship of Theseus, but you're the ship

demands.descriptionTemplate: Small changes. Preferences. Habits. Beliefs. You'll barely notice. Until you do.
Your true name. More power than you think. More consequences than you imagine.

demandPatterns.flavorText: You'll still be you. Technically. Philosophically debatable.

demandPatterns.name: Temporal Thief
demandPatterns.description: Time theft - they get years, you get service

demands.descriptionTemplate: Ten years off your lifespan. You won't miss them. Until you do.
Summon them at midnight. Exact midnight. Atomic clock recommended.

demandPatterns.flavorText: Time is money. They want time. You want service. Math is unfavorable.

demandPatterns.name: The Simple Exchange

demands.descriptionTemplate: Gold. Gems. Art. Something valuable. Something you'll miss.

demandPatterns.flavorText: No tricks. No twists. Just capitalism. Somehow this is suspicious.

demandPatterns.name: Exclusive Contract
demandPatterns.description: Demands loyalty - relationship status: it's complicated

demands.descriptionTemplate: Exclusive service. No other entities. They're very jealous.
They suggest. You comply. Not control. Just... strong recommendations.

demandPatterns.flavorText: Monogamy but for summoning. They take it seriously. Very seriously.

demandPatterns.name: Location Bond
demandPatterns.description: Tied to places - real estate matters in every realm

demands.descriptionTemplate: Summon them somewhere specific. Meaningful. Inconvenient.
Maintain their shrine. Clean it. Tend it. Forever.

demandPatterns.flavorText: Location, location, location. They have requirements. Geographic requirements.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Fights with supernatural skill. Efficient. Brutal. Doesn't monologue.
templates.flavorText: Violence as art form. You're the gallery.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Curses enemies. Creative curses. Memorable curses. Reversible curses. Technically.
sideEffects: Cursed targets tend to seek revenge
templates.flavorText: Curses are like art. Subjective. Permanent. Expensive to remove.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Destroys everything in a wide area. Everything. Indiscriminately.
templates.timeRequired: Minutes of channeling, years of cleanup
templates.flavorText: Precision is overrated. Devastation is thorough.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Reveals lies, secrets, hidden things. Also reveals things you'd rather not know.
templates.flavorText: Ignorance is bliss. This service ends bliss.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Access to knowledge mortals shouldn't have. And now you know why.
templates.flavorText: Some knowledge is forbidden for good reasons. You'll find out which.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Glimpse futures. Possible futures. Probable futures. Futures you can't prevent.
templates.flavorText: See what's coming. Can't stop it. Welcome to prophecy.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Creates impossible objects. Powerful objects. Temperamental objects.
templates.flavorText: Makes wonders. Wonders with side effects. Wonders with attitudes.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Builds structures impossibly fast. Also impossibly strange.
templates.flavorText: Fast construction. Quality guaranteed. Euclidean geometry not guaranteed.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Opens portals. Convenient. Dangerous. Occasionally opens to wrong place.
templates.flavorText: Fast travel. Unsafe travel. Travel nonetheless.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Grants flight. True flight. Terrifying flight.
templates.flavorText: Fly like eagle. Fall like stone. Choose wisely.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Become something else. Think like something else. Return uncertain.
templates.flavorText: Be anything. Anything might be permanent.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Makes living things grow rapidly. Heal rapidly. Regret rapidly.
templates.flavorText: Growth accelerated. Maturity negotiable. Side effects guaranteed.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Creates barriers. Strong barriers. Expensive barriers.
templates.flavorText: Protection guaranteed. Duration negotiable. Survival probable.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Protects you. Judges you. Protects you anyway.
templates.flavorText: Protected from harm. Not from judgment. Especially not from judgment.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Inflicts bad luck. Persistent bad luck. Karma-grade bad luck.
templates.flavorText: Curse them. Universe balances eventually. Eventually includes you.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Haunts them. Nightmares. Fears. Regrets. The greatest hits.
Grants luck. Supernatural luck. Luck that runs out.
templates.flavorText: Lucky now. Unlucky later. Universe maintains balance.

templates.descriptionTemplate: Channels divine power. For benefits. With strings attached.
templates.flavorText: Divine power. Divine judgment. Package deal.

contract.name: One-Time Service
contract.description: Single task, immediate payment, no strings

instant_service.flavorText: Quick. Simple. Over. Like pulling a tooth.

contract.name: Temporary Arrangement
contract.description: Days or weeks of service, minimal commitment

long_term_contract.flavorText: Long term commitment. Your term. Their choice.

permanent_bond.flavorText: Forever is long time. Especially for descendants.

soul_contract.flavorText: Soul standard. Terms negotiable. Damnation guaranteed.

employment_agreement.flavorText: Employee-employer relationship. With cosmic entities. HR is complicated.

pedantic: Maintains mental tally of your failures

effectTemplates: They visit personally. The visit is unpleasant.
Instant curse. Reversible. Expensive to reverse.
They wait. Plan. Strike when perfect. Devastatingly.
Slow unraveling of everything you built.
delayed_vengeance.flavorText: Revenge served cold. Frozen solid. Absolute zero.

effectTemplates: Your luck runs out. Gradually. Completely.
cumulative_degradation.flavorText: First strike warning. Second strike worse. Third strike creative.

bloodline_curse.flavorText: Descendants will remember. Will curse your name. Justifiably.

effectTemplates: They leave disappointed. You feel guilt.
warning_shot.flavorText: Warning delivered. Next time worse. Much worse.

demon.name: Demonic Forms
baseFormOptions: Humanoid with horns, tail, entirely too many teeth
Shadow given form, burning eyes, terrible purpose
Beast-human hybrid, disturbing proportions
Beautiful humanoid, one wrong detail, very wrong
Insect swarm in person shape, buzzing consensus
Impossibly thin, too many joints, bends wrong
Corpulent mass, shifting surface, hungry
Covered in eyes/mouths/both, seeing/tasting everything
soundExamples: Voice layered with whispers of your failures
Words that hurt ears and soul equally
demon.flavorText: Demons have standards. Low standards. Negotiable standards.

devil.name: Devilish Forms
baseFormOptions: Impeccable suit, obsidian skin, perfect nails for signing
Living contract, geometric precision, textual perfection
Dark metal statue, impossible detail, judging eyes
Horned authority figure, radiates order, demands respect
Human appearance, subtle wrongness, uncanny precision
auraExamples: Ink and parchment and cosmic law
soundExamples: Precise speech, measured words, calculated pauses
devil.flavorText: Devils have style. Professional style. Terrifying style.

angel.name: Angelic Forms
baseFormOptions: Armored humanoid, wings, troubled expression
Multiple wings, covered in eyes, watching everything
Geometric light construct, mathematical perfection
Beautiful humanoid, warm radiance, tired eyes
Wheels and wings, impossible geometry, biblical accuracy
auraExamples: Safety and obligation in equal measure
The weight of righteousness and its burdens
soundExamples: Clear tones demanding attention and compliance
Speaking with harmonic overtones and undertones of duty
smellExamples: Incense and clean air and high standards
angel.flavorText: Angels help. Whether you want it or not. Mostly not.

spirit.name: Spirit Forms
baseFormOptions: Translucent outline, humanoid suggestion
Floating abstraction, defying categorization
Elemental manifestation, primordial force
Symbolic representation, living metaphor
Animal form, knowing eyes, unnatural
Shifting presence, definition optional
soundExamples: Natural sounds - wind, water, fire, earth
spirit.flavorText: Spirits exist. Therefore concept exists. Or reverse. Philosophy unclear.

fey.name: Fey Forms
baseFormOptions: Beautiful humanoid, plant features, dangerous
Tiny winged creature, mischievous energy
Beast with knowing eyes, too knowing
Impossibly attractive, slightly wrong, very wrong
Natural materials given form, seasonal incarnation
Beauty and terror, equal measure
soundExamples: Laughter like bells, or screaming, hard to tell
fey.flavorText: Fey are beautiful. Beautiful is dangerous. Very dangerous.

djinn.name: Djinn Forms
baseFormOptions: Humanoid torso, smoke lower body, elemental power
Towering elemental, wreathed in primal forces
Living fire/water/air/earth, thinking element
Shifting between solid and ethereal, choosing neither
auraExamples: Weight of wishes, burden of granting
djinn.flavorText: Djinn grant wishes. Literal wishes. Careful what you wish for.

psychopomp.name: Death-Related Forms
baseFormOptions: Cloaked figure, no visible face, patient
Skeletal humanoid, patient bones
Beautiful guide, sorrowful eyes, inevitable
Death animal - raven, crow, psychopomp traditional
Hourglass/clock given form, time incarnate
auraExamples: Stillness of death, peace or terror
End and transition, neither good nor bad
soundExamples: Speaking like funeral bell, final tone
smellExamples: Nothing - absence of life, presence of end
psychopomp.flavorText: Death comes. Eventually. They help. Whether you want help or not.

outsider.name: Beyond Reality
baseFormOptions: Geometry that shouldn't exist, existing anyway
Constantly shifting, never settling, always wrong
Multiple forms, same space, physics weeping
Pattern hurts to perceive, perceive anyway
Absence shaped like something, nothing shaped like absence
Too many/few dimensions, math screaming
soundExamples: Voice from impossible directions, multiple simultaneously
Sound that shouldn't exist, existing loudly
outsider.flavorText: Outsiders exist beyond reality. Reality objects. They don't care.

servitor.name: Created Servants
baseFormOptions: Humanoid construct, clay/metal/energy
Simplified human form, function over form
Practical design, aesthetic optional
Whatever creator wanted, got instead
auraExamples: Unlife, not quite dead, not quite alive
soundExamples: Echo of creator's voice, imperfect copy
smellExamples: Nothing - not truly alive, not truly anything
servitor.flavorText: Servitors serve. By design. Whether serving is wise, creator's problem.

descriptionTemplates: Basic summoning circle, three candles, pronunciation guide optional
Circle drawn in chalk/blood/both, symmetry important
Geometric perfection required, they check, they judge
failureConsequences: Nothing happens, embarrassing
Wrong entity appears, awkward
They appear, mock your circle, leave
circle_basic.flavorText: Circles keep them in. Or you in. Or both. Draw carefully.

descriptionTemplates: Multi-layered circle, sacred geometry, arcane mathematics
Perfect geometric construction, atomic precision, bring ruler
Living circle of specific materials, expensive, elaborate
failureConsequences: Entity appears, judges circle, annihilates it
Partial manifestation, partial entity, partial success
Circle inverts, you're trapped, they're amused
circle_complex.flavorText: Complex circles for complex entities. Complexity compounds failure.

descriptionTemplates: Something personally meaningful, their choice of meaning
Object from significant moment, significance subjective
Sacrifice of comfort/convenience, permanent
failureConsequences: They appear, reject offering, leave disappointed
Accept offering, deny service, keep offering
offering_symbolic.flavorText: Symbolic offerings. Symbol important. To them. Not you.

descriptionTemplates: Rare material, specific quantity, precise quality
Something from another realm, import fees
Artifact of power, irreplaceable, required anyway
failureConsequences: Offering consumed, service denied
Partial offering accepted, partial service rendered
They take offering, you, both

descriptionTemplates: Specific celestial alignment, astronomical precision required
Planetary conjunction, missed window next century
Eclipse - solar/lunar/both - timing critical
failureConsequences: Wrong timing, wrong entity, wrong everything
Partial manifestation, unstable, temporary, angry
timing_astronomical.flavorText: Celestial timing. Universe cares not for your schedule.

descriptionTemplates: Place of power, ley line convergence, energy node
Somewhere meaningful - birth/death/both
Threshold location - crossroads, doorway, between places
failureConsequences: Wrong location, entity confused, you blamed
Location contested, multiple entities, problems

descriptionTemplates: True name, pronunciation exact, spelling irrelevant
Secret knowledge, forbidden for good reasons
Understanding of cosmic truths, sanity optional
failureConsequences: Wrong name, wrong entity, wrong dimension
Knowledge incomplete, summoning incomplete, entity unhappy
Knowledge too complete, entity impressed, you doomed
knowledge_forbidden.flavorText: Some knowledge summons. Some knowledge damns. Often both.

descriptionTemplates: Moral purity, genuine righteousness, they verify
Specific virtue demonstrated, recently, provably
Clean conscience, clear intent, pure heart
failureConsequences: Purity insufficient, summoning fails, you judged
False purity detected, entity offended, consequences
purity_moral.flavorText: Purity required. Real purity. Fake doesn't count. They know.

descriptionTemplates: Moral corruption, genuine wickedness, recent preferred
Specific sin committed, categories available
Conscience blackened, soul stained, heart darkened
failureConsequences: Corruption insufficient, they leave bored
Too corrupted, entity impressed, you consumed
corruption_moral.flavorText: Evil attracts evil. Birds of feather. Damned together.
